name: Five Nights at Sponic's 2
description:
The log awaited sequel to the terrible game Five Nights at Sponic's now with edgy and cool characters. You are Trails who is sneaking into an underground base to spy on the enemy team to help your friends with a war.... Inspired by FNW39 and FNaS3. A parody on scratch FNaF fan games. Made in scratch......

CHEATS:

TYPE E WHEN THE NIGHT STARTS TO SKIP THE NIGHT
